_header: As I came by an way / Of one I herde say
_description: Dame Siriȝ — 450 lines in couplets and 6-line stanzas

BodDig86.First Lines:
As I com bi an waieHof on ich herde saieFul modi mon &
                    proudWis he wes of lore…
BodDig86.Last Lines:
…An eni clerc of luve hire bedeBote hoe graunte & lete him
                    spede
BodDig86.Note:
Modern transcription is San Marino, CA,  Henry Huntington Library HM 183 [olim Hawkins], ff.
                    10.1-10.7.
BodDig86.Attributed Title:
Ci comence le fablel & la cointise de dame siriz (f.
                    165)
